info.title: APIs
info.description: Documentation automatically generated by the swagger-autogen module.

get.description: Returns a list of all users, optionally filtered by search term

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term to filter the list of users

get.description: Returns array of Users, that are friends with current user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of User whose friends requesting

post.description: Add a new location to the database

get.description: Retrieve an location by its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the location to retrieve

200.description: The location with the given id

put.description: Updates the location with the given ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the location to be updated

delete.description: Deletes the location with the given ID

get.description: Returns a list of all albums, optionally filtered by search term

post.description: Add a new album to the database

get.description: Retrieve an album by its id

put.description: Updates the album with the given ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the album to be updated

delete.description: Deletes the album with the given ID

get.description: Returns a list of all posts, optionally filtered by search term

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term to filter the list of posts

get.summary: Get number of likes on post
get.description: returns number of likes on post based on id

200.description: Access token and refresh token for the newly registered user.

400.description: User with the same email already exists.

post.description: Logs in to an existing user and returns access and refresh tokens.

200.description: Returns access token and refresh token.

400.description: Bad request. Username or password missing.

403.description: Forbidden. Invalid login credentials. Password doesnt match User.

post.description: Get a new access token by sending a valid refresh token

200.description: Returns access token and refresh token.

post.summary: Revoke refresh tokens for a user
post.description: Revokes all the refresh tokens of a user by their userId

get.summary: Get all sent friend requests by user
get.description: Retrieves all friend requests sent by a user to other users.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The type of request (from or to)

post.description: Send a friend request to another user.

parameters.name: fromId
parameters.description: The ID of the user sending the FriendRequest.

parameters.name: toId
parameters.description: The ID of the user receiving the FriendRequest.

post.description: Handle a friend request by approving or rejecting it.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the friend request to handle.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status to set for the friend request(status will appear in the revoked parameter of FriendRequest)

get.description: Returns a list of all tokens
